resources.string: Storage location to store converted videos

FFmpeg Java Wrapper for Android compiled with x264, libass, fontconfig, freetype, fribidi and LAME. Supported architecture: armv7, armv7-neon, armv8, x86, x86_64.

This app initially built as proof of concept, but after a while I have decided to publish this for everyone\'s usage. Email me for ideas to improve the app.

Github: https://github.com/zaidaiman/And.FF

Special thanks to
- http://writingminds.github.io/ffmpeg-android-java/ for FFmpeg Java Wrapper for Android
- https://github.com/aNNiMON/Lightweight-Stream-API for Lightweight Stream
